Class AnimationManager

java.lang.Object
AnimationManager
public class AnimationManager extends Object
Manages animations for game objects. Provides methods to create different types of animations for player and enemies, and handles cancellation and cleanup of active animations.
Version:
2025.03.25
Author:

  • Constructor Details

    • AnimationManager

      public AnimationManager()

  • Method Details

    • createPlayerJumpAnimation

      public static void createPlayerJumpAnimation(Player player)
      Creates a jump animation for the player. This animation temporarily makes the player invisible and then visible again to create a visual effect during jumps.
      Parameters:
      player - The player object to animate.

    • createEnemyAttackAnimation

      public static void createEnemyAttackAnimation(Enemy enemy)
      Creates an attack animation for an enemy. This animation briefly makes the enemy invisible and then visible again to create a visual "flash" effect during attacks.
      Parameters:
      enemy - The enemy object to animate.

    • createDeathAnimation

      public static void createDeathAnimation(GameObject object)
      Creates a death animation for a game object. For Player objects, this delegates to the player's own death animation. For other objects, it creates a simple animation that makes the object disappear.
      Parameters:
      object - The game object to animate during its death.

    • cleanupAllAnimations

      public static void cleanupAllAnimations()
      Stops and removes all active animations.
